articles.author: Kevin Buckland
articles.title: Asia shares perk up as receding inflation fears lift Wall Street - Reuters
articles.description: Asian stocks rose on Friday, setting the region up for a weekly gain, as investors tempered fears about hot inflation and the prospects of an early tapering of stimulus by the Federal Reserve.
articles.content:

articles.title: The Springboks' Rugby Championship return confirmed by Sanzaar - SARugbymag
articles.description: The Springboks will make their return to the Rugby Championship with two home Tests before embarking on a four-match tour of Australasia, according to the 2021 tournament schedule.
articles.content:

articles.title: 70-year-old man linked to TTSH cluster dies from Covid-19 complications - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A 70-year-old Singaporean man linked to the Tan Tock Seng Hospital (TTSH) cluster here has died from complications related to Covid-19, bringing the total number of deaths here to 32. The Health Ministry said on Thursday (May 20) that the man had …

articles.title: Scientists in Asia resumed work far quicker than western counterparts, international COVID lockdown - EurekAlert
articles.description: Researchers in China, Japan, and Singapore were able to resume research much quicker than their counterparts in the US and Europe after the first covid lockdowns, results of a new international survey suggest.
